Gramps shakes his head.

Gramps: Don't need a lift, thank you...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, December 04, 2000 8:11 PM
Subject: Re: Windlord ask something to Aerotaur


> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Relax I'm right here.  And yes we'd better go help them."  He swoops
> around landing to place the CR chamber down.  He soars back up into the
air.
> "Windlord, why don't you take them to the new Nightlight to the new base
> along with Trinity, Zeni, and Termitron.  I'll go low and pick up Perplex,
> Gramps, and Land Mine to check it out.  You can follow the signal back and
> lead us to the base when you're done.  And who knows we may get some more
> company."  He scans for Gramps and Perplex.  Gramps is moving faster so he
> lands a short distance in front of him.  "Hop on there's no time to
explain
> but we're going on a rescue mission."
>
>
>
>
